mod.label: MOD
mod.hint: To specify if something modifies something else.

xp.label: XP
xp.hint: The current experience points your vault hunter has

import.label: Import
import.hint: Import a JSON file to add new stuff to your world.

export.label: Export
export.hint: Export all stuff from your world to a JSON file.

actorStuffBrowser.label: Actor Stuff Browser
actorStuffBrowser.hint: This is the Actor Stuff Browser. Here you can find all the stuff you need for your actors. You can search for archetypes, classes, skills and actions. You can also add new stuff or edit existing stuff.

actions.label: Actions
actions.hint: Actions are the abilities of an actor.

archetypes.label: Archetypes
archetypes.hint: Archetypes are the basic character types of a Vault Hunter.

classes.label: Classes
classes.hint: Classes are the different roles a Vault Hunter can take.

skills.label: Skills
skills.hint: Skills are things that modify the abilities and attributes of a Vault Hunter.

backgrounds.label: Backgrounds
backgrounds.hint: Backgrounds are the history of a Vault Hunter.

vaultHunter.label: Vault Hunter
vaultHunter.hint: Vault Hunters are the main characters of the Borderlands series. They are the playable characters and the protagonists of the story. Each Vault Hunter has a unique skill and three skill trees to choose from.

name.label: Name
name.hint: The name of your Vault Hunter.

archetype.label: Archetype
archetype.hint: The Archetype of your Vault Hunter.

class.label: Class
class.hint: The Class of your Vault Hunter.

background.label: Background
background.hint: The Background of your Vault Hunter.

level.label: Level
level.hint: The current level of your Vault Hunter.

actionSkill.label: Action Skill
actionSkill.hint: The Action Skill of your Vault Hunter.

current.label: XP
current.hint: The current experience points your Vault Hunter has.

segment.label: XP Segment
segment.hint: The amount of XP per segment for this level.

defenses.label: Defenses
defenses.hint: The stuff that keeps your Vault Hunter alive.

favoredGun.label: Favored Gun
favoredGun.hint: The types of guns your Vault Hunter prefers to use.

meleeDie.label: Melee Die
meleeDie.hint: The die your Vault Hunter uses for melee attacks.

movement.label: Movement
movement.hint: The movement speed in squares of your Vault Hunter.

badassRank.label: Badass Rank
badassRank.hint: The Badass Rank of your Vault Hunter.

badassTokens.label: Badass Tokens
badassTokens.hint: How many Badass Tokens your Vault Hunter has.

gold.label: Gold
gold.hint: The amount of gold your Vault Hunter has.

initative.label: Initiative
initative.hint: The initiative modifier of your Vault Hunter.

grenades.label: Grenades
grenades.hint: The amount of grenades your Vault Hunter has.

potions.label: Potions
potions.hint: The amount of potions your Vault Hunter has.

skills.label: Skills
skills.hint: The skills of your Vault Hunter.

backgroundTraits.label: Background Traits
backgroundTraits.hint: The traits granted by your Vault Hunter's background.

archetypeFeats.label: Archetype Feats
archetypeFeats.hint: The feats granted by your Vault Hunter's archetype.

nonVaultHunter.label: Non-Vault Hunter
nonVaultHunter.hint: Non-Vault Hunters are the NPCs of the Borderlands series. They are the enemies and the supporting characters of the story. Non-Vault Hunters can be anything from bandits to robots.

environmental.label: Environmental
environmental.hint: Environmental Actors are the world itself. They are the non-living parts of the world that can still interact with the players. Environmental Actors can be anything from a door to a trap.

minion.label: Minion
minion.hint: Minions are the sidekicks of the characters. They are the companions and the pets of the actors. Minions can be anything from a robot to a skag.

key.unique: There can only be one entry with this key

order.unique: There can only be one entry with this order

defenses.label: Defenses
defenses.hint: You can configure the available Defenses for your World here. These will be used by actors to specify what type of shield, armor or health they have and which element deals what kind of damage to them.

key.label: Key
key.hint: A unique key to identify the Defense.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Readable name that will be shown in sheets.

description.label: Description
description.hint: A description for this Defense to provide an explanation which will be shown when hovered over this Defense in a sheet.

order.label: Order
order.hint: The order in which the defense instances will be used during the damage calculation (lower entries will be damaged first).

max.label: Max
max.hint: The maximum value for this Defense.

current.label: Current
current.hint: The current value of this Defense.

recharge.label: Recharge
recharge.hint: How much the current value increases per round if the actor wasn't hit.

isLife.label: Is life
isLife.hint: Identifies if the actor counts as dead if this Defense gets to current = 0.

requiresItem.label: Requires an Item
requiresItem.hint: Specifies if the Defense requires an Item or if it uses values.

item.label: Item
item.hint: If *Requires an Item* is set to true, this defense won't use the max, current etc. values but values from an item.

elements.label: Elements
elements.hint: You can configure the available Elements for your World here. These can be used for weapons, shields, grenade mods and more.

key.label: Key
key.hint: A unique key to identify the Element.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Readable name that will be shown in sheets.

description.label: Description
description.hint: A description for this Element to provide an explanation which will be shown when hovered over this Element in a sheet.

icon.label: Icon
icon.hint: If you want cool looking damage values select a file for this Element.

color.label: Color
color.hint: Damage for this Element will use this color in Chat Cards etc.

strongAgainst.label: Strong against
strongAgainst.hint: Select the Defenses this Element deals double damage to (e.g. Shock Element deals double damage to Shields).

weakAgainst.label: Weak against
weakAgainst.hint: Select the Defenses this Element only deals half damage to.

ignores.label: Ignores
ignores.hint: Select the Defenses this Element ignores when dealing damage (e.g. radiation ignores Shields and Armor and deals damage directly to Health).

gunTypes.label: Gun Types
gunTypes.hint: Configure the available Gun Types for your World here. These will be used by guns to specify their type and preconfigured levels.

key.label: Key
key.hint: A unique key to identify the Gun Type.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Readable name that will be shown in sheets.

description.label: Description
description.hint: A description for this Gun Type to provide some fancy flavor texts when talking about it.

icon.label: Icon
icon.hint: Reading is hard, make it easier by using images!

levels.label: Levels
levels.hint: Preconfigured levels for this Gun Type that specify the accuracy, damage and range.

manufacturers.label: Manufacturers
manufacturers.hint: You can configure available Manufacturers for your World here. These will be used by guns, shields etc.

key.label: Key
key.hint: A unique key to identify the Manufacturer.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Readable name that will be shown in sheets.

description.label: Description
description.hint: A description for this Manufacturer to provide some fancy flavor texts when talking about it.

icon.label: Icon
icon.hint: Every Manufacturer needs some kind of logo to be worth their salt.

allowedForItems.label: Allowed for Items
allowedForItems.hint: Select the Item Types this Manufacturer produces.

allowedForGunTypes.label: Allowed for Guns
allowedForGunTypes.hint: Select the Gun Types this Manufacturer produces.

levels.label: Levels
levels.hint: You can configure the available Levels for your World here. These will be used by your Vault Hunter to specify the max level aswell as the required xp per level to level up.

xpSegment.label: XP Segment
xpSegment.hint: The amount of XP per segment for this level.

io.label: I/O Settings
io.hintShort: Let you Import or Export System defined Settings
io.hintLong: This Utility is used to Import & Export Systemvalues like gun types, manufacturers and the like. Every imported setting will be overwritten completely s be careful
